short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Instagram Follower Export Tool to Extract Instagram follower and following and export to CSV with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instagram Follower Export Tool automatically scrape user profile from Instagram followers and followings and export to CSV.

# Features
✓ Export followers from Instagram
✓ Export following list from Instagram
✓ Extract user profile, including follower and following count, biography, public Email, etc.

# How to get started?
1. Enter Instagram Username
2. Select Export type: FOLLOWERS or FOLLOWING
3. Select Include user profile in the Extension Setting if you want to export user profile. This feature will take longer, as data needs to be requested for each user. 
4. Click Export Button

# FAQ
https://instagramfollowexport.cningot.com/#faq
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at support@cningot.com.

# Data Privacy
All the data you process is on your local computer and never passes through our servers.

# Statement
There is a risk that your account may be deactivated or blocked by Instagram when using the extension and you should control the frequency of use at your own risk.

# About Pro
It's a paid extension, you can export the first 500 profiles of each extraction for free trial.
